creator: dli@cisco.com
text:
On Mac OS 10.4.10 and 10.4.11, I see the following exception. The JVM passes the
parameter "hints" as null, LinearGradientPaintContext access it without checking
if it is null. (This is similar to bug 44194, which occurs to
RadialGradientPaintContext)

Created attachment 21391
The patch is to make sure variable "hints" is not null before accessed in LinearGradientPaintContext's constructor

The patch should be applied to
org.apache.batik.ext.awt.LinearGradientPaintContext file.
